ComicInfo.Title: Samson and Delilah!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Peter Parker makes his way to a talk on Gamma therapy at
Empire State University by Doctor Leonard Samson only for events to take a turn for the worst leading to a showdown with the Rhino for the amazing Spider-man with Doc Samsons life at stake...
